entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Leamington
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:59 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy late this evening. 60 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming east 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 3 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow or rain. Temperature steady near zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow in the morning. Rain or freezing rain beginning near noon. Local rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near zero. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain mixed with freezing rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain or freezing rain. Local rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
